UPDATED* This patch has been rejected. 2006-03-09 07:51:24 UTC - JoelBryan

=== Summary ===

A more graphical logout dialog, that helps the user identify a logout screen.

the patch will enable a logo on top of the logout dialog.

=== Introduction ===

I feel that the current GUI layout of the logout dialog needs a makeover, so I make this patch to make it more prettier! - JoelBryan

=== Patch ===

The Patch is available <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/gnome-session/+bug/34088|here]]</nowiki>

=== How to apply patch ===

 1. Get the gnome session source [sudo apt-get source gnome-session]
 2. dpkg-buildpackage -rfakeroot on gnome-session directory
 3. Apply the patch to logout.c
 4. make, make install
